entry.title: Proposed BIP for OP_CAT
entry.summary:
The author of the email is expressing their willingness to switch from using OP_SUCCESS80 to OP_SUCCESS126 if there is enough interest and a strong desire in the community to do so. They state that they don't have a preference for OP_SUCCESS80 and are open to using OP_SUCCESS126 instead. The author then asks if anyone objects to this switch.
Overall, the email discusses the possibility of enabling OP_CAT on Bitcoin and proposes switching to OP_SUCCESS126 instead of OP_SUCCESS80 if there is sufficient interest and support from the community.
